to.networld.schandler.interfaces
Interface ICard

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicCard, BasicMifare, ISO15693, OpenPGP
public interface ICard

Interface that offers basic functionality for the handling of cards that are able to communicate with the specification PC/SC 2.0.

Author:
Alex Oberhauser

Nested Class Summary
static class ICard.CardType
          Enumeration that includes the different card types, sorted by ID.
static class ICard.HASH_TYPE
          Supported hash types.

setTerminal

void setTerminal(javax.smartcardio.CardTerminal _terminal)
Possible to change the related reader for this card. null value is NOT permitted.

Parameters:
_terminal - A object that encapsulates the reader.

setProtocol

void setProtocol(String _protocol)
Possible to change the related protocol for this card. null value is NOT permitted.

Parameters:
_protocol - The protocol as String value.

getTerminal

Returns:
The current related reader for this card.

The current related protocol for this card.

getCard

javax.smartcardio.Card getCard()
Returns:
The card that is related to this object.

sendAPDUCommandToCard

javax.smartcardio.ResponseAPDU sendAPDUCommandToCard(byte[] _command)
                                                     throws javax.smartcardio.CardException
Send a command to the card. For example to read out values or to write data to the card.

Parameters:
_command - The command encoded in bytes.
Returns:
A ResponseAPDU that encapsulates the response.
Throws:
javax.smartcardio.CardException

sendAPDUCommandToCard

javax.smartcardio.ResponseAPDU sendAPDUCommandToCard(javax.smartcardio.CommandAPDU _command)
                                                     throws javax.smartcardio.CardException
Sends a APDU command to the card. Used to interact with a connected card.

Parameters:
_command - The command encapsulated in CommandAPDU
Returns:
A ResponseAPDU that encapsulates the response.
Throws:
javax.smartcardio.CardException

disconnect

void disconnect(boolean _reset)
                throws javax.smartcardio.CardException
Disconnect from the card.

Parameters:
_reset - Reset the connection or not.
Throws:
javax.smartcardio.CardException

getCardType

ICard.CardType getCardType()
The card type from the ATR bytes (entry 13 and 14).

Returns:
The name of the card as enumeration entry.
